summary: Adds a variant of the Jester\'s armor.
descriptionHtml:
This is for those of you that want the Jester\'s armor, but don\'t want to look like... well... a jester.

This mod adds a craftable set of armor to the game; Dark Shrouded Armor. This armor functions the same as Cicero\'s armor, except it has the Shrouded armor model (and a higher armor rating).
Each piece of armor is crafted with an ebony ingot and the corresponding armor piece. (Cicero\'s clothes)

Have fun and happy stabby mcstabby stabbing.
-Nuclear Eagle
author: Nuclear Eagle
